H0.text: Which is the most southerly of the Shipping Forecast areas. Biscay

H1.text: Which is the most southerly of the Shipping Forecast areas. Plymouth

H2.text: Which is the most southerly of the Shipping Forecast areas. Finisterre

H3.text: Which is the most southerly of the Shipping Forecast areas. Trafalger

A4.text: Trafalgar is included only in the 00:48 forecast, except when gales or more are due there.
